Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 11:55:22
Folder: C3P1W48 - november 2024 salary payment
Message Count: 1

--------------------------------------------------
ID: C3P1W48_00
From: DRIVE <Drive.Admin@chalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2024-11-25 09:05
Subject: November 2024 Salary payment
--------------------------------------------------
Hello Hagop, 

We have processed your November 2024 salary. It should reach your bank account in the next 1 to 3 working days.

To access your pay slip, please follow the steps outlined below:
     -    Go to Drive and click on the 'Digital Personnel File' <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdpda9b3a33ac-gyw7uu21k2.hana.ondemand.com%2Fdpd-web%2F%3FtoEmployees%3Dtrue&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ccb1c1e266ee14cc5714b08dd0d0ec692%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638681079301007683%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=1lKqONS5T6XxdCFXqdTgxRuz6qfjrzFwIY8QDJZqpgo%3D&reserved=0>  tile
     -    Click on the arrow next to the 'Payslip' folder on the left menu bar
     -    Select the relevant year folder from the drop down list to view/download your pay slip

If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to reach out to your HR team for assistance.

Thank you for your continuous efforts and hard work.

This is an autogenerated e-mail, please do not reply.



مرحبا Hagop

If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to reach out to your HR team for assistance.

Thank you for your continuous efforts and hard work.

This is an autogenerated e-mail, please do not reply.



مرحبا Hagop 

تم تحويل راتبك لشهر November 2024 . و سيصل إلى حسابك المصرفي خلال ثلاثة أيام عمل.

للإطلاع على كشف الراتب الخاص بك، الرجاء اتباع الخطوات التالية: 
     -    الولوج إلى Drive والضغط على ملف الموظف الرقمي 'Digital Personnel File' <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fdpda9b3a33ac-gyw7uu21k2.hana.ondemand.com%2Fdpd-web%2F%3FtoEmployees%3Dtrue&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Ccb1c1e266ee14cc5714b08dd0d0ec692%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638681079301033917%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=2EWt7jgGR0strmFAjFtQ186EKFEM3U3r%2FyS1r7qLVks%3D&reserved=0> 
     -    الضغط على السهم إلى جانب Payslips في القائمة على اليسار
     -    اختيار الملف المطلوب بناءً على السنة المعيّنة من القائمة لعرض/تنزيل كشف الراتب الخاص بك

للاستفسار، يمكنك التواصل مع قسم الموارد البشرية للحصول على المساعدة.

شكرًا لك على جهودك المستمرة!
